TEXT.TITLE: NELSON HOLDINGS UNIT IN FILM PACT
TEXT.BODY: <Nelson Holdings International Ltd's> Nelson Entertainment Inc unit said it has entered an agreement to co-finance ten motion pictures with Hemdale Releasing Corp. Under the pact Nelson will have domestic home video rights and Hemdale will be responsible for distribution in all other media. Reuter
